title: Getting Started with Next.js
excerpt: Learn the basics of Next.js and how to build your first application with this powerful React framework.
content:
Next.js has revolutionized how developers build React applications. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the key features that make Next.js stand out and walk through building your first application.

Why Next.js?

Next.js offers several advantages over plain React:

  • Server-side rendering out of the box
  • Static site generation for blazing fast pages
  • File-based routing system
  • API routes for backend functionality
  • Image optimization
author: John Developer
